mapper.insert: insert into member (member_no, member_email, member_password, member_name, member_birthday, member_mailing, member_join_date, member_state, member_sex, member_host_state) values(member_seq.nextval, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberBirthday}, #{memberMailing}, sysdate,1, 0, 0)
mapper.update:
update member
member_name=#{memberName },
member_email=#{memberEmail },
member_password=#{memberPassword },
member_Birthday=#{memberBirthday },
member_Phone=#{memberPhone },
member_Mailing=#{memberMailing },
member_Profile=#{memberProfile },
member_Sex=#{memberSex },
member_Address=#{memberAddress },
where member_no=#{memberNo}
update member set member_password=#{memberPassword} where member_email=#{memberEmail}
update member set member_image=#{memberImage} where member_email=#{memberEmail}
update member set member_state=0 where member_email=#{email}
update member set member_last_login=sysdate where member_email=#{email}
update member set member_host_state=1 where member_no=#{memberNo}
